name: Alien Frontiers for iPad
blurb: Funding the completion of the Alien Frontiers iPad App

rewards.reward: RECRUIT -- Pledge $5 to receive your choice of a PINK or GRAY Bit Kit. Includes eight wooden colonies, six D6, and 1 Scoring Rocket, all in your choice of PINK or GRAY. Or, add $5 to any pledge to add a PINK or GRAY Bit Kit to your rewards. No additional shipping charges apply.

BUDDY SYSTEM -- Pledge $10 to receive BOTH the PINK and GRAY Bit Kits. Includes sixteen wooden colonies (8 Pink & 8 Gray), twelve D6 (6 Pink & 6 Gray), and 2 Scoring Rockets (1 Pink & 1 Gray). Or, add $10 to any pledge to add BOTH the PINK and GRAY Bit Kits to your rewards. No additional shipping charges apply.
ENLISTED SPACER -- Alien Frontiers App for iPad & your name in the game credits as an Enlisted Spacer

PLATOON PACK -- Three copies of the Alien Frontiers App for iPad & three names in the game credits as a Spacer Platoon. (This reward level was added at the request of a potential backer who wanted to get copies of the app for his wife and daughter, as well as himself)
ENSIGN OF THE SPACE CORPS -- Alien Frontiers App for iPad & your name in the game credits as a Space Corps Ensign. Plus the PDF book "The Art of Alien Frontiers".

LIEUTENANT J.G. OF THE SPACE CORPS -- Alien Frontiers App for iPad & your name in the game credits as a Space Corps LT J.G.. Plus the PDF book "The Art of Alien Frontiers". Plus the FACTIONS board game expansion and the Pink and Gray Bit Kits. USA Shipping Included. Add $10 for Worldwide Shipping.

LIEUTENANT OF THE SPACE CORPS -- Alien Frontiers App for iPad & your name in the game credits as a Space Corps Lieutenant. A zippered iPad sleeve and matching stylus. Plus the PDF book "The Art of Alien Frontiers". Add $10 for shipping outside of North America.

COMMANDER OF THE SPACE CORPS -- Alien Frontiers App for iPad & your name in the game credits as a Space Corps Commander. An iPad portfolio with shoulder strap and a matching stylus. Plus the PDF book "The Art of Alien Frontiers". Add $10 for shipping outside of North America.

CAPTAIN OF THE SPACE CORPS -- Alien Frontiers App for iPad & your name in the game credits as a Space Corps Captain. The tabletop board game "Alien Frontiers" and two additional player colors. Plus the PDF book "The Art of Alien Frontiers". Add $10 for shipping outside of North America. NOTE: If requested, and if available, we can arrange for European backers to receive the EU edition (Alien Frontiers: Aurora) instead of the American version.

COMMODORE OF THE SPACE CORPS -- Alien Frontiers App for iPad & your name in the game credits as a Space Corps Commodore. Plus an Alien Frontiers themed "Gelaskin" for your iPad, a matching stylus, and the PDF book "The Art of Alien Frontiers". But Wait, There's More! You'll also receive Beta Dev Team access and will receive and play every pre-release build between KS Funding and App Launch on your iPad and you'll have access to the Beta Dev Forum where you can leave direct feedback to the programmers. Add $10 for shipping outside of North America.

ADMIRAL OF THE SPACE CORPS -- Alien Frontiers App for iPad & your name in the game credits as a Space Corps Admiral. Plus the PDF book "The Art of Alien Frontiers" and a stylus. But Wait, There's More! You will receive a brand new 3rd Gen iPad with WiFi and 16gb of storage in your choice of white or black. (add $125 to your pledge for 32gb) (add $250 to your pledge for 64gb) We'll also add an Apple Smart Cover in the color of your choice. And...this is the biggie...we'll have an original piece of Mark Maxwell Alien Frontiers art laser-etched onto the back of the iPad by "In A Flash Laser". Worldwide Shipping is included at no additional charge, but you're going to have to pay import duties on your own if applicable.
